information: The company BERGSTEIN GMBH, is a Service Provider, founded in 1989, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Nurseries, Textile plants, Structural work, and Finishing work industries. It is based in Dinslaken, Germany.
